Author: kittypandaprincess
Text: I can't offer advice or anything but just wanted to say that I'm in a similar situation. My therapist asked me if I thought I could deal with not having my scale in the house, and wanted to see if my husband could get rid of it for me. I'm supposed to be doing better and ~recovering~ but honestly they can pry it out of my hands then catch these hands... I'm sorry you're going back to old behaviors. I know how hard it is.
